Question: The fame of his alter ego "this personl" soon spread around the world.
Hints: This paper, known as the "cut pages in diary document", was compiled by various members of this personl's family after his death.
When issued it also included a copy of this personl's pamphletted lecture, Eight or Nine Wise Words About Letter-Writing.
She termed the traditional image of Dodgson "the ____l Myth".
